articles.author: Alexa St. John, Nora Naughton
articles.title: China doesn't want American cars anymore. That's a problem. - Business Insider
articles.description: Chinese automakers are giving US car companies a run for their money — and that's forcing Ford and GM to make some hard decisions about their futures.
articles.content: Chinese automakers are giving US car companies a run for their money, especially as the momentum behind electric vehicles accelerates  and that could force the likes of Ford and GM to make some hard … [+3403 chars]

articles.title: Belgium destroys shipment of American beer after taking issue with 'Champagne of Beer' slogan - CNN
articles.description: Belgium has destroyed a shipment of American beer after taking exception to its maker's slogan that it was "The Champagne of Beers."
articles.content:
Belgium has destroyed a shipment of American beer after taking exception to its makers slogan that it was The Champagne of Beers.

articles.title: State Department says it's in contact with 'several hundred' American citizens in Sudan - Fox News
articles.description: The State Department says it's in touch with several hundred of American citizens in Sudan as a growing civil conflict in the African country has emerged.
articles.content:
The U.S. Department of State says that it's in contact with several hundreds of American citizens in Sudan as a growing civil conflict is emerging in the African nation.
